publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3526 Mike Pringle: Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh—That the Parliament welcomes delegates from Jordanstown School, Belfast, Kaunas School for partially sighted children, Lithuania, St Joseph’s School for the Visually Impaired, Dublin, Schule für Blinde und Sehbehinderte, Hamburg and Resource Centre Vision, Sweden to the "Look at Me - Moving Forward!" European school project at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh; welcomes the three-year project to promote what young people with severe visual impairment can achieve in education, leisure and independent living, and looks forward to the launching of a web site and DVD in 2008 at the conclusion of the project, which will show young people living with a visual impairment participating fully and actively in the community and at school.
S2M-3526 Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh (lodged on 7 November 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3526 Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh (lodged on 7 November 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3526 Mike Pringle: Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh—That the Parliament welcomes delegates from Jordanstown School, Belfast, Kaunas School for partially sighted children, Lithuania, St Joseph’s School for the Visually Impaired, Dublin, Schule für Blinde und Sehbehinderte, Hamburg and Resource Centre Vision, Sweden to the "Look at Me - Moving Forward!" European school project at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh; welcomes the three-year project to promote what young people with severe visual impairment can achieve in education, leisure and independent living, and looks forward to the launching of a web site and DVD in 2008 at the conclusion of the project, which will show young people living with a visual impairment participating fully and actively in the community and at school. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Donald Gorrie
S2M-3526 Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh (lodged on 7 November 2005) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-3526 Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh (lodged on 7 November 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-3526 Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh (lodged on 7 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3526 Look at Me - Moving Forward at the Royal Blind School, Edinburgh (lodged on 7 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
